headline: Fitch Downgrades Padagis to 'B+'; Outlook Stable
summary: Fitch Ratings has downgraded the Long-term Issuer Default Ratings of Padagis Holding Company LLC and Padagis, LLC to 'B+' from 'BB-'.Fitch has also downgraded the secured credit facility ratings of...
